parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The category ID as returned by the all ESG categories endpoint.

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: BuysAndSellsOnly
parameters.description: Whether to includes only Buy, Close position, Sell, Short Sell, Write Opt. to Open, Write Opt. to Close, Buy Opt. to open, Buy Opt. to close. Default to false.

parameters.name: ShowUnconfirmed
parameters.description: Whether to show unconfirmed transactions. Default to false.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Default to 1.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Page size to return. Default to 100.

parameters.name: IncludePendingUnsettled
parameters.description: Whether to include pending unsettled cash transactions. Default to false.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Default to 1.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Page size to return. Default to 100.

parameters.name: ToDate

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Account search string. This parameter accepts wildcards (*).

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: An array of account IDs. If AccountIds are provided, all other parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Default to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size to return. Default to 100.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term based on security code or security description. If Search is provided, SecurityIds and SecurityCodes will be ignored.

parameters.name: securityIds
parameters.description: A list of security IDs to search. If SecurityIds are provided, Search and SecurityCodes will be ignored.

parameters.name: securityCodes
parameters.description: A list of security codes to search. If SecurityCodes are provided, Search and SecurityIds will be ignored.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.description: EventId as returned by the report event endpoint.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: FileID as returned in the publisher event detail endpoint.

parameters.name: ValuationDate

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: IncludeCash
parameters.description: Whether cash should be included. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeLoans
parameters.description: Whether loans should be included. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeTaxCredits
parameters.description: Whether or not to include tax credits. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeForeignTaxPaid
parameters.description: Whether or not to include foreign tax paid. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeExcludedSecurities
parameters.description: Whether or not to include any security that has been excluded from performance. Default to false.

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: IncludeCash
parameters.description: Whether cash should be included. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeLoans
parameters.description: Whether loans should be included. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeExcludedSecurities
parameters.description: Whether or not to include any security that has been excluded from performance. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeTaxCredits
parameters.description: Whether or not to include tax credits. Default to false.

parameters.name: MultiplePeriods
parameters.description:
The periods to return. Default to -1.
  • 0 - For the period only
  • 4 - 1 mth, 3 mths, the period
  • 9 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, Since inception
  • 11 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception
  • 16 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 10 yrs, Since inception
  • 1 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 1 yr, the period
  • 24 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period
  • 15 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs
  • 17 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 14 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, Since inception
  • 13 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 5 yrs, Since Inception
  • 21 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, Since inception
  • 22 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 18 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs
  • 2 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, the period
  • 8 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception
  • 10 - 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 19 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs, 10 yrs
  • 3 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period
  • 23 - 1 yr, 5 yrs, 10 yrs, Since inception
  • 7 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 1 yr, Since inception
  • 5 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 6 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 3 yrs, Since inception
  • 20 - The period, Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, Since inception
  • -1 - Account default

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: IncludeTaxCredits
parameters.description: Whether or not to include tax credits. Default to false.

parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.description: Whether cash should be included. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeExcludedSecurities
parameters.description: Whether or not to include any security that has been excluded from performance. Default to false.

parameters.name: IncludeTaxCredits
parameters.description: Whether or not to include tax credits. Default to false.

parameters.description: Praemium ID of the Benchmark as returned in the benchmark endpoint.

parameters.description:
The periods to return. Default to -1.
  • 0 - For the period only
  • 4 - 1 mth, 3 mths, the period
  • 9 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, Since inception
  • 11 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception
  • 16 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 10 yrs, Since inception
  • 1 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 1 yr, the period
  • 24 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period
  • 15 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs
  • 17 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 14 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, Since inception
  • 13 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 5 yrs, Since Inception
  • 21 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, Since inception
  • 22 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 18 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs
  • 2 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, the period
  • 8 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception
  • 10 - 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 19 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs, 10 yrs
  • 3 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.description: The from date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.description: The to date used when calculating data for the request.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Default to 1.

parameters.description: Page size to return. Default to 100.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID provided by Praemium.

parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret provided by Praemium.

CategoryIds.description: An array of ESG category IDs.
An array of ESG category IDs.

DeemedAmount.description: The buyback capital value applied for CGT purposes. (Account currency)

BuyBack.description: If the transaction is classified as a buyback.

AmountInTradedCurrency.description: Displays the amount traded in an international currency.

TradedCurrency.description: For International Investments. Displays the currency in which the asset was traded.

SettlementDate.description: The date on which the transaction settled.

AmountInSettlementCurrency.description: Displays the amount settled in an international currency.

SettlementCurrency.description: Displays the currency in which the trade was settled.

Broker.description: The name of the broker against the transaction.

GstClaimable.description: The total of any GST amount that is payable. (Account currency)

BrokerageGst.description: The GST amount of any brokerage for the transaction. (Account currency)

BrokerageIncludingGst.description: The total of any brokerage for the transaction including GST. (Account currency)

TransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

TransactionDate.description: The date on which the transaction occurred.

Quantity.description: The number of units or shares disposed.

NetAmount.description: This value should be adjusted (increased for a buy, decreased for a sell) for any brokerage, GST or other charges paid to transact. (Account currency)

Unconfirmed.description: Whether the transaction has not been confirmed.

AveragePrice.description: Net amount divided by quantity. (Account currency)

DisposalMethod.description: Tax method used on the security disposal.

Narration.description: Displays any notes that have added to the transaction.

TransactionTypeDescription.description: A categorised type of the transaction.

Currency.description: Denominated currency of the cashbook transactions.

OpeningBalance.description: Cashbook balance at the FromDate in the denominated currency.

Deposits.description: Sum of all credit type transactions for the cashbook in the denominated currency.

Withdrawals.description: Sum of all debit type transactions for the cashbook in the denominated currency.

ClosingBalance.description: Cashbook balance at the ToDate in the denominated currency.

TransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

TransactionDate.description: The date on which the transaction occurred.

TransactionTypeDescription.description: A categorised type of the transaction.

Narration.description: Displays any notes that have added to the transaction.

Deposit.description: The amount in the denominated currency if this transaction is a credit type.

Withdrawal.description: The amount in the denominated currency if this transaction is a debit type.

Balance.description: The balance in the denominated currency of the cash book after the transaction has been credited or debited.

TransactionDate.description: The date on which the transaction occurred.

Quantity.description: The number of units or shares disposed.

NetAmount.description: This value should be adjusted (increased for a buy, decreased for a sell) for any brokerage, GST or other charges paid to transact. (Account currency)

AveragePrice.description: Net amount divided by quantity. (Account currency)

Brokerage.description: Total of any brokerage for the transaction. (Account currency)

Gst.description: GST amount of any brokerage for the transaction. (Account currency)

DisposalMethod.description: Tax method used on the security disposal.

Narration.description: Displays any notes that have added to the transaction.

TradedCurrency.description: For International Investments. Displays the currency in which the asset was traded.

AmountInTradedCurrency.description: Displays the amount traded in an international currency.

SettlementDate.description: The date on which the transaction settled.

OtherCharges.description: Total of any other charges (eg. international transaction processing fees) for the transaction. (Account currency)

OtherChargesGst.description: GST amount of any other charges for the transaction. (Account currency)

DrpType.description: Either DRP (Dividend Reinvestment Plan) or BSP (Bonus Share Plan).

FromDate.description: The date that the DRP is active from.

ToDate.description: The date that the DRP is active to.

MaxSharesParticipating.description: The number of shares held that are requested to participate in the reinvestment plan.

PercentSharesParticipating.description: The percentage of the DRP to take as shares. Note that this cannot be used in conjunction with MaxSharesParticipating.

ExcludeFromDrp.description: Whether the security is excluded from the account-wide reinvestment plan.

Title.description: The user's title. Miss = 0, Mr = 1, Mrs = 2, Ms = 3, Dr = 4, Prof = 5, or null.

TownOrCityOrState.description: State or town or city details.

Country.description: Country code. For example, AUS = Australia.

DateOfBirth.description: For security purposes if we need to identify the user over the phone.

MothersMaidenName.description: For security purposes if we need to identify the user over the phone.

Addresses.description: Contains details of the user's address.

PhoneOther.description: An alternative phone number for the investor.

AdviserId.description: The adviser ID for this user's adviser.

GenerateGetStartedToken.description: Whether to generate an SSO token for this user to get started.

GetStartedToken.description: An SSO token for this user to get started.

UserRole.description: Accountant = 0, Custodian = 1, FinancialPlanner = 2, InvestmentAdviser = 3, Other = 4, Owner = 5. Default to 4.

Usages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the account.

EntireBalance.description: Whether the entire balance of the external fund account will be transferred.

ExpectedAmount.description: Expected contribution amount to be transferred. Set if ContributionSources.EntireBalance is false.

MinAmountWithTax.description: Fee overwrite minimum amount with tax.

MaxAmountWithTax.description: Fee overwrite maximum amount with tax.

Type.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

DefaultValueWithTax.description: Default value of overwrite with tax.

Usage.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the account.

Description.description: This will advise the bank account usage.

IsMandatory.description: If the bank account is mandatory, true or false.

HelpText.description: Help text with regards to the bank account.

From.description: Value from which the fee tier is applicable.

IsTiered.description: If the fee override is tiered.

Tiers.description: The fee override tier if applicable.

IsSingleBankAccount.description: Is a single bank account, true or false.

TaxWrapperId.description: Tax wrapper ID. CgtChargeable = 1, TaxExempt = 2, Isa = 4, OffshoreBond = 5, OnshoreBond = 6, PersonalPension = 7, RtsRats = 8, Sipp = 9, GroupSipp = 10, Ssas = 11, S32 = 12, TrustNotUkTaxable = 13, CompanyNotUkTaxable = 14, Qnups = 15, Qrops = 16, Efurbs = 17, Ebt = 18, Jisa = 20, OffshoreBondPersonalised = 21.

IsAllowedByApl.description: Is the security allowed by the Approved Product List. (Only returned when PdsId is supplied) (AU only)

MissingReasonText.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

TransferMethod.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

Proportion.description: The portion of the benefit that should be paid to the beneficiary. These must add up to 100%.

Cash.description: Select if the initial investment will include cash.

Shares.description: Select if the initial investment will include shares.

ApplicationId.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

From.description: From date that applicant held tax residence in that country.

To.description: To date that applicant held tax residence in that country.

NoDocument.description: If the applicant does not hold a identification document.

Method.description: ElectronicTransfer (not applicable for regular contribution) = 2, Cheque = 3, StandingOrder (for regular contribution only) = 4.

Frequency.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

InSpecieCashStockTransferDetails.description: In specie cash stock transfer details.

Status.description: Draft = 0, AwaitingSignature = 1, AwaitingApproval = 2, AwaitingFund = 3, Funded = 4, Trading = 5, ClosureRequested = 6, Closed = 7, Deleted = 8.

ApplicationId.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

EffectiveDate.description: Date the expense was deemed to have been incurred.

TaxDate.description: Date used for tax action reporting purposes.

GstRefundableAmount.description: Refundable amount of GST the account is eligible to claim for the expense. (Account currency)

DeductibleAmount.description: Portion of the expense that can be claimed as a tax deduction. (Account currency)

NonDeductibleAmount.description: Portion of the expense that cannot be claimed as a tax deduction. (Account currency)

ExpenseTypeGroupDescription.description: Expenses categorised as Admin / Investment / Member / Non-investment.

ExpenseTypeDescription.description: Description of the expense type. Please visit the Expense Types pages in Help Centre for a full list.

FileId.description: Unique ID of the generated file.

FileName.description: Generated file name of the file.

TotalCost.description: The total account cost based on the cost base of unrealised holdings. (Account currency)

TotalValue.description: The total account value based on the quantity and price of unrealised holdings. (Account currency)

NetValue.description: The total account value inclusive of receivables and payables. (Account currency)

TotalGainOrLoss.description: Total Gain/Loss is the nominal difference between the total value and the total cost. (Account currency)

AssetClassDescription.description: A description of the asset class.

Value.description: The total value of the account holdings within the asset class. (Account currency)

PercentTotalValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value of this asset class to the total account value.

PercentNetValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value of this asset class to the net account value.

MinTargetAllocation.description: The minimum asset class allocation target for this asset class entered for the account.

MaxTargetAllocation.description: The maximum asset class allocation target for this asset class entered for the account.

MidPointTargetAllocation.description: The middle value of the minimum and maximum target allocation for the asset class.

Variance.description: The variance of the asset classs value outside of the target allocation range.

Description.description: Description of the receivable / payable holding.

TotalAmount.description: Amount of the receivable / payable. (Account currency)

IncludedInNetValue.description: Whether included in the account's net value.

Value.description: The value that is attributable to this model on the date. (Account currency)

Quantity.description: The quantity that is attributable to this model on the date. Please note that this may not be a whole number of shares because we blend holdings within our system in order to give a better investment outcome..

Holdings.description: Contains the holdings attributable to the model on the date.

Date.description: The date that these holdings relate to.

TotalValue.description: The total value of the account on the date. (Account currency)

HoldingsInModel.description: Holdings that are held by the account due to its model subscriptions.

HoldingsNotInModel.description: Holdings that are not attributable to a model on the date. This can be due to holding locks or other customisations. The value and quantity of the HoldingsNotInModel relate to the values that are not attributable to any subscribed model.

ValuationDate.description: Date used to display the data.

TotalCost.description: The total account cost based on the cost base of unrealised holdings. (Account currency)

TotalValue.description: The total account value based on the quantity and price of unrealised holdings. (Account currency)

NetValue.description: The total account value inclusive of receivables and payables. (Account currency)

MarketValueGainOrLoss.description: MarketValueGainOrLoss as a result of the market price (MV) movement of the security. (Account currency)

ExchangeRateGainOrLoss.description: ExchangeRateGainOrLoss as a result of the movement of the exchange rate (FX). (Account currency)

EstimatedIncome.description: Indicative field calculated based on the income of each asset generated over the past twelve months. (Account currency)

Yield.description: The estimated income as a percentage of the market value of the account.

AssetClassDescription.description: A description of the securitys asset class.

AssetClassCode.description: The asset class code of the securitys asset class.

AssetClassCategory.description: The asset class category of the securitys asset class.

TypeDescription.description: The asset type of the securitys asset class.

GicsDescription.description: The global industry classification of the security.

Quantity.description: The number of securities held by the account at the recalculation date.

UnitCost.description: Average unit cost of the holding. This is the actual cost divided by the quantity. (Account currency)

Cost.description: Actual cost is based on the cost base of unrealised holdings. (Account currency)

UnitValue.description: The last price of the holding available at the recalculation date. (Account currency)

UnitPriceDate.description: The date of the unit price. (Account currency)

Value.description: Value is calculated based on the unit price multiplied by the quantity. (Account currency)

PercentTotalValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value relative to the total account value.

MarketValueGainOrLoss.description: MarketValueGainOrLoss as a result of the market price (MV) movement of the security. (Account currency)

ExchangeRateGainOrLoss.description: ExchangeRateGainOrLoss as a result of the movement of the exchange rate (FX). (Account currency)

PercentTotalGainOrLoss.description: The total gain or loss (TG) expressed as a percentage over the adjusted cost base.

EstimatedIncome.description: Indicative field calculated based on the income of each asset generated over the past twelve months. (Account currency)

Yield.description: The estimated income as a percentage of the market value of the account.

ValueInSecurityCurrency.description: The value based on the quantity and local price of unrealised holdings.

TaxCredits.description: The tax credits available on the current holdings of the security. (Account currency)

EstimatedFrankingCredits.description: Amount expected to be received in franking credits. (Account currency)

EstimatedGrossYield.description: Estimated gross yield is based on the sum of the estimated income and franking credits as a percentage of the holding's market value.

Code.description: The asset code of the receivable / payable.

Description.description: A description of the receivable / payable.

Amount.description: The total value of the receivable/payable. (Account currency)

IncludedInNetValue.description: Whether included in the account's net value.

Weighting.description: Accounts model weighting at the valuation date.

AUD.description: Cash model weighting at the valuation date.

TaxWithheld.description: Total tax withheld on the income record. (Account currency)

Receivable.description: Amount of income yet to be received. (Account currency)

Drp.description: Amount received via dividend reinvestment. (Account currency)

IncomeTotal.description: Total value of the income record. (Account currency)

PaymentDate.description: Payment date of the income record.

ExecutionDate.description: Execution date of the income record.

IncomeSource.description: Whether the income was Australian or foreign based.

ForeignTaxPay.description: Amount of foreign tax of the income record. (Account currency)

FrankingCredit.description: Franking credit amount attributable to the income. (Account currency)

TrustOtherExpenses.description: Other expenses related to the income record. (Account currency)

TaxWithheld.description: Total tax withheld on the income record. (Account currency)

IncomeTotal.description: Total value of the income record. (Account currency)

NonAssessableTotal.description: Total amount that is non assessable for tax purposes. (Account currency)

TrustCgtDistributionsTotal.description: Amount received due to distributed capital gains. (Account currency)

ForeignIncomeTotal.description: Amount received from non-Australian sources. (Account currency)

Drp.description: Amount received via dividend reinvestment. (Account currency)

AustralianTrustOther.description: Australian sourced income component that is not classified as one of the other types. (Account currency)

FrankedTotal.description: Amount received that was franked. (Account currency)

UnfrankedTotal.description: Amount received that was unfranked. (Account currency)

TaxDate.description: Tax date of the income record.

AccruedAmount.description: Income amount that is accrued. (Account currency)

UpdatedDate.description: Model status update. Note that this date refers to an update of the model description, not the model weights.

TotalValue.description: Total market value of the account. (AUD)

ModelWeight.description: Account weight in the requested model.

NumberOfAccountsLinked.description: Number of accounts linked to the model.

Date.description: The date used to calculate performance data.

CumulativePercentageReturn.description: Cumulative percentage return from the FromDate to Date.

PeriodDescription.description: A description of the period the returns are calculated for.

GrossPercentageReturn.description: The performance percentage return excluding expenses.

NetPercentageReturn.description: The performance percentage return including expenses.

TargetValuePercentage.description: Target value in the model for the security.

ActualValuePercentage.description: Percentage that was implemented allowing for market movements and minimum cash. This is record in the model shadow account for the model.

Isin.description: International securities identification number of the security.

Target.description: The current percentage weight of the security in the model.
The target percentage weight of the security in the model.

ModelId.description: The model ID as returned by the model endpoint.

ModelCode.description: Model code. (Model code **ProRata** means pro rata across existing models)

Sequence.description: Sequence to apply. (Starting from 1 as highest priority, then 2, 3 ...)

Percentage.description: Model percentage. (Only applicable for regular contribution, income reinvestment, one-off direct debit)

CashflowInstructionType.description: Regular contribution = 1, Regular withdrawal = 2, One-off direct debit = 3, One-off withdrawal = 4, Income reinvestment = 5, Expenses = 6, Pension payment = 7 (Only allowed for SuperSMA pension accounts), All contributions and rollovers = 8 (Only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation accounts), Other withdrawals = 9, Term deposit maturity = 10, Term deposit order = 11, Superfund withdrawals and rollovers = 16 (Only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation and pension accounts), Insurance premiums = 17 (Only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation and pension accounts).

FrequencyType.description: Adhoc =0, Monthly = 1, Quarterly = 2, SixMonthly = 3, Annually = 4, Daily = 5, Weekly = 6.

StartDate.description: Start date of the cashflow instruction.

EndDate.description: End date of the cashflow instruction.

Amount.description: Amount of the one-off cashflow instruction to apply.

CashflowInstructionType.description: Regular contribution = 1, Regular withdrawal = 2, Income reinvestment = 5, Expenses = 6, All contributions and rollovers = 8 (only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation accounts), Other withdrawals = 9, Superfund withdrawals and rollovers = 16 (Only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation and pension accounts), Insurance premiums = 17 (Only allowed for SuperSMA accumulation and pension accounts).

StartDate.description: Start date of the cashflow instruction. (Only applicable for regular withdrawal)

EndDate.description: End date of the cashflow instruction. (Only applicable for regular withdrawal)

Amount.description: Amount of the cashflow instruction to apply. (Only applicable for regular contribution and regular withdrawal)

StartValue.description: Market Value of the asset class at the FromDate. (Account currency)

EndValue.description: Market Value of the asset class at the ToDate. (Account currency)

TotalReturn.description: Total dollar return for the period. (Account currency)

TotalReturnPercent.description: Total return for the period as a percentage.

BenchmarkReturnPercent.description: Total return for the benchmark as a percentage.

CapitalAppreciation.description: Realised and unrealised gains / losses of the account. (Account currency)

TotalIncome.description: The total income of the account received within the performance period. Income and tax credits are included in performance calculations when they are first acknowledged in the account. That is, when they are first declared according to the ex-date. (Account currency)

TaxCredits.description: The total tax credits of the account received within the performance period. (Account currency)

ForexMovements.description: The gain/loss of the account attributable to foreign exchange movements. (Account currency)

GrossDollarReturn.description: The sum of all dollar return fields excluding expenses. (Account currency)

TotalExpenses.description: The total expenses recorded against the account within the period. The Trading Activity > Income & Expenses > Expense Details page provides the ability to view these expenses. (Account currency)

NetDollarReturn.description: The sum of all dollar return fields. (Account currency)

PeriodDescription.description: A description of the period the returns are calculated for.

GrossPercentReturn.description: The performance percentage return excluding expenses.

NetPercentReturn.description: The performance percentage return including expenses.

HoldingsExcluded.description: The number of individual securities excluded from account performance calculations.

BeginningMarketValue.description: The beginning market value of the account on the From Date. (Account currency)

EndingMarketValue.description: The ending market value of the account on the To Date. (Account currency)

NetCapitalMovement.description: The net additions and withdrawals that flowed into and out of the account within the performance period. The transactions that make up this net amount when including cash are available from the Additions and withdrawals report. (Account currency)

NetInternalTransfers.description: Internal transfers between cash books that are not to be treated as a client addition or withdrawal. (Account currency)

CashExpenses.description: Expenses incurred by the account within the period, to be paid from either a account cash book or external bank account. (Account currency)

UnallocatedAmount.description: An unallocated amount will show if the sum of the above does not equal the Movement in value amount - that is, there is a component of the difference between the starting and ending market value that has not been explained. This will usually be because the cash side of a transaction or income event cannot be found. (Account currency)

PercentTotalReturn.description: Total return for the period in percentage terms.

TotalReturn.description: Total dollar return for the period. (Account currency)

TaxCredits.description: Tax credit amount receivable within the period.(Account currency)

TotalIncome.description: Total income within the period. (Account currency)

IncomeNotYetPaid.description: Income declared but not yet paid at the ToDate. (Account currency)

IncomeCash.description: Income that was paid to cash. (Account currency)

IncomeDrp.description: Income that was reinvested as part of a DRP. (Account currency)

EndMarketValue.description: Market value of the security at the ToDate. (Account currency)

PercentCapitalReturn.description: Return for the period attributable to capital returns.

GainOrLoss.description: Dollar gain / loss in the response period. (Account currency)

Sales.description: Sum of sales within the period. (Account currency)

Purchases.description: Sum of purchases within the period. (Account currency)

BeginningMarketValue.description: Market value of the security at the FromDate. (Account currency)

IncludedInPerformance.description: Whether the security is included in performance calculations. (Account currency)

NetOtherAmount.description: Other net amount within the period. (Account currency)

PercentIncomeReturn.description: Return for the period attributable to income returns.

Withdrawals.description: Withdrawal amount that the security received in the period. (Account currency)

Deposits.description: Deposit amount that the security received in the period. (Account currency)

Expenses.description: Expenses charged against the security within the period. (Account currency)

InternalTransfers.description: Transfer amount for the period. (Account currency)

InterestReceipts.description: Interest amount that the security received in the period. (Account currency)

Income.description: Income amount that the security received in the period. (Account currency)

Other.description: Other amount that the security received in the period. (Account currency)

Purchases.description: Total security purchases within the period. (Account currency)

OpeningBalance.description: Opening balance of the security at the FromDate. (Account currency)

IncludedInPerformance.description: Whether the security is included in performance calculations.

Sales.description: Total security sales within the period. (Account currency)

ClosingBalance.description: Closing balance of the security at the ToDate. (Account currency)

BeginningMarketValue.description: The beginning market value of the account on the Date. (Account currency)

EndingMarketValue.description: The ending market value of the account on the Date. (Account currency)

NetContribution.description: The net additions and withdrawals that flowed into and out of the account within the performance period. The transactions that make up this net amount when including cash are available from the Additions and withdrawals report. (Account currency)

NetInternalTransfers.description: Internal transfers between cash books that are not to be treated as a client addition or withdrawal. (Account currency)

TotalExpenses.description: The total expenses recorded against the account within the period. The Trading Activity > Income & Expenses > Expense Details page provides the ability to view these expenses. (Account currency)

TaxCredits.description: The total tax credits of the account received within the performance period. (Account currency)

NetPercentReturn.description: The performance percentage return inclusive of expenses.

CumulativePercentageReturn.description: The cumulative percentage return of the account from the From Date to the DailyReturns Date.

CumulativeNetPercentReturn.description: The cumulative net percentage return of the account from the From Date to the DailyReturns Date.

PeriodDescription.description: The period the returns are calculated for.

PercentageReturn.description: The percentage return of the benchmark for the period.

FromDate.description: The start date the holding is excluded from performance calculations for the account.

ToDate.description: The end date the holding is excluded from performance calculations for the account.

Application.description: The ID of the application the user will be sent to once logged in. Platform = 0, InvestorPortal = 1, AdviserPortal = 2, ApplicationPortal = 3.

UserId.description: The ID of the user to log in. Either UserId or Username is required.

Usi.description: Unique superannuation identifier (USI) is used in SuperStream to identify an APRA fund and/or its superannuation product which an employee (member) is contributing to.

ProductName.description: Product name of the superannuation fund.

CgtGain.description: Calculated based on what is optimal for the disposal method selected. (Account currency)

OtherGain.description: Equal to the gross gain if applicable. Applies if the asset was purchased within the last 12 months relative to the as at date requested for this section. (Account currency)

IndexedGain.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the market value, if applicable. (Account currency)

DiscountedGain.description: The net of the gross gain and discount applied based on amounts that have had the discount rate applied. If the account is for a company, then the discounted rate applied will be zero. For an individual the discount rate applied is 50%. (Account currency)

OptimalCgtCalculationMethod.description: The disposal method selected to calculate CGT gains.

GrossGain.description: Equal to the market value minus the adjusted cost. Shows the gain before any discounting or indexing is applied. (Account currency)

SaleProceeds.description: The amount the parcel was sold for. (Account currency)

IndexedCost.description: If the security was acquired prior to 30/09/1999 and was held for more than one year, the cost base is increased by applying an indexation factor based on increase in CPI. (Account currency)

CgtLoss.description: Applicable if there is a loss on a tax parcel and the purchase date is post 19 September 1985. (Account currency)

TaxFreeAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax free. (Account currency)

ActualCost.description: The amount the parcel was purchased for less any GST refundable amount. (Account currency)

Quantity.description: The number of units or shares disposed.

PurchaseDate.description: Typically, this is the same as the Tax date unless a corporate action has occurred, such as a takeover, where CGT rollover relief applies.

TaxDate.description: The date of the original purchase of the parcels, as used for tax purposes.

AdjustedCost.description: The actual cost adjusted for any corporate actions, such as tax deferred distributions, or subsequent transactions. (Account currency)

PreCgtGainLoss.description: Gain if Pre-CGT calculation method is selected. (Account currency)

TaxDate.description: The date of the original purchase of the parcels, as used for tax purposes.

PurchaseDate.description: Typically, this is the same as the Tax date unless a corporate action has occurred, such as a takeover, where CGT rollover relief applies.

Quantity.description: The number of units or shares disposed.

ActualCost.description: The amount the parcel was purchased for less any GST refundable amount. (Account currency)

TaxDeferredAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax deferred. (Account currency)

TaxFreeAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax free. (Account currency)

AdjustedCost.description: The actual cost adjusted for any corporate actions, such as tax deferred distributions, or subsequent transactions. (Account currency)

TaxDate.description: The date of the original purchase of the parcels, as used for tax purposes.

GrossGain.description: Equal to the Market value minus the Adjusted cost. Shows the gain before any discounting or indexing is applied. (Account currency)

DiscountedGain.description: The net of the gross gain and discount applied based on amounts that have had the discount rate applied. If the account is for a company, then the discounted rate applied will be zero. For an individual the discount rate applied is 50%. (Account currency)

IndexedGain.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the market value, if applicable. (Account currency)

OtherGain.description: Equal to the gross gain if applicable. Applies if the asset was purchased within the last 12 months relative to the as at date requested for this section. (Account currency)

CgtGainLoss.description: The CGT gain is calculated based on what is optimal for the disposal method selected. In some cases the indexed gain is used to optimise the use of losses. The CGT gain calculated from a less than optimal method is shown in italics for information purposes only and is excluded from the totals for the account. NA is shown if a calculation method is not applicable. (Account currency)

PreCgtGainLoss.description: Gain if Pre-CGT calculation method is selected. (Account currency)

LossesCarriedForward.description: Any losses from the prior years that have been carried forward. (Account currency)

LossesCurrentYear.description: The total amount of losses incurred from asset disposals during the tax year. (Account currency)

CgtDisposalsDiscounted.description: Disposal amounts that have had the discount rate applied. (Account currency)

CgtDisposalsIndexed.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the disposal value, if applicable. (Account currency)

CgtDisposalsOther.description: Applies if the asset was disposed within 12 months of acquisition. (Account currency)

CgtDistributionsDiscounted.description: Distribution amounts that have had the discount rate applied. (Account currency)

CgtDistributionsIndexed.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the disposal value, if applicable. (Account currency)

CgtDistributionsOther.description: Applies if the asset was disposed within 12 months of acquisition. (Account currency)

LossesAppliedDiscounted.description: Losses attributable against discounted gains. (Account currency)

LossesAppliedIndexed.description: Losses attributable against indexed gains. (Account currency)

LossesAppliedOther.description: Losses attributable against other gains. (Account currency)

DiscountApplied.description: The amount of discount allowable. (Account currency)

NetCapitalGainLoss.description: The account's net capital gain (or loss) for the tax year. (Account currency)

NetCapitalGainLossDiscounted.description: The account's net capital gain (or loss) related to discounting. (Account currency)

NetCapitalGainLossIndexed.description: The account's net capital gain (or loss) related to indexing. (Account currency)

NetCapitalGainLossOther.description: The account's net capital gain (or loss) not relating to discounting or indexing. (Account currency)

CgtGain.description: Calculated based on what is optimal for the disposal method selected. (Account currency)

OtherGain.description: Equal to the gross gain if applicable. Applies if the asset was purchased within the last 12 months relative to the as at date requested for this section. (Account currency)

IndexedGain.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the market value, if applicable. (Account currency)

DiscountedGain.description: The net of the gross gain and discount applied based on amounts that have had the discount rate applied. If the account is for a company, then the discounted rate applied will be zero. For an individual the discount rate applied is 50%. (Account currency)

OptimalCgtCalculationMethod.description: The disposal method selected to calculate CGT gains.

GrossGain.description: Equal to the market value minus the adjusted cost. Shows the gain before any discounting or indexing is applied. (Account currency)

MarketValue.description: The amount the parcel is worth using the current market price. (Account currency)

IndexedCost.description: If the security was acquired prior to 30/09/1999 and was held for more than one year, the cost base is increased by applying an indexation factor based on increase in CPI. (Account currency)

AdjustedCost.description: The actual cost adjusted for any corporate actions, such as tax deferred distributions, or subsequent transactions. (Account currency)

TaxFreeAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax free. (Account currency)

TaxDeferredAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax deferred. (Account currency)

ActualCost.description: The amount the parcel was purchased for less any GST refundable amount. (Account currency)

Quantity.description: The number of units or shares held for each tax parcel.

PurchaseDate.description: Typically, this is the same as the Tax date unless a corporate action has occurred, such as a takeover, where CGT rollover relief applies.

TaxDate.description: The date of the original purchase of the parcels, as used for tax purposes.

CgtLoss.description: Applicable if there is a loss on a tax parcel and the purchase date is post 19 September 1985. (Account currency)

CgtExemptGainLoss.description: The gross gain or loss on tax parcels with that are CGT exempt, including those with a purchase date before the CGT legislation applied. (Account currency)

ActualCost.description: The amount the parcel was purchased for less any GST refundable amount. (Account currency)

AdjustedCost.description: The actual cost adjusted for any corporate actions, such as tax deferred distributions, or subsequent transactions. (Account currency)

MarketValue.description: Market Value of the security at the ValuationDate. (Account currency)

GrossGain.description: Equal to the market value minus the adjusted cost. Shows the gain before any discounting or indexing is applied. (Account currency)

DiscountedGain.description: The net of the gross gain and discount applied based on amounts that have had the discount rate applied. If the account is for a company, then the discounted rate applied will be zero. For an individual the discount rate applied is 50%. (Account currency)

IndexedGain.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the market value, if applicable. (Account currency)

OtherGain.description: Equal to the gross gain if applicable. Applies if the asset was purchased within the last 12 months relative to the as at date requested for this section. (Account currency)

CgtGain.description: Calculated based on what is optimal for the disposal method selected. (Account currency)

CgtLoss.description: Applicable if there is a loss on a tax parcel and the purchase date is post 19 September 1985. (Account currency)

CgtExemptGainLoss.description: The gross gain or loss on tax parcels with that are CGT exempt, including those with a purchase date before the CGT legislation applied. (Account currency)

Amount.description: Rebalance tolerance amount. Prevents trades of a value less than this figure.

Percentage.description: Rebalance tolerance percentage. Prevents trades unless they exceed this figure as a percentage of the portfolios value. For example, if this is set to 5, only trades that exceed five percent of the portfolios total value are performed.

Units.description: Rebalance tolernace number of units. Prevents trades of a quantity less than this figure.

Amount.description: Minimum trade size amount. Prevents trades of a value less than this figure.

Percentage.description: Minimum trade size percentage. Prevents trades unless they exceed this figure as a percentage of the portfolios value. For example, if this is set to 5, only trades that exceed five percent of the portfolios total value are performed.

Units.description: Minimum trade size number of units. Prevents trades of a quantity less than this figure.

expires_in.description: After how many seconds an access token will expire.

ext_expires_in.description: Extended lifetime of access token if value of this field is greater than value of expires_in.

access_token.description: Access token that can be used to access public API endpoints.

ConsolidationType.description: None = 78, Portfolio = 80, Transaction = 84, FeeGroup = 85, ShareTrader = 86, SuperFund = 87.

EntityType.description: Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

ValuationDate.description: Account valuation date or asat date.

FirstTransactionDate.description: The first transaction date of the account.

CreatedDate.description: The created date of the account.

LastRecalcDate.description: The run-date of the latest account recalculation.

RecalcRequired.description: Whether this account requires recalculation to accurately calculate all values.

MarketValue.description: The Valuation of the account on the valuation date.

Product.description: The description of the account product.

BenchmarkId1.description: The unique ID of the account's benchmark 1.

Benchmark1.description: The name of the accounts benchmark 1.

BenchmarkMargin1.description: The margin (% p.a.) of the accounts benchmark 1.

BenchmarkId2.description: The unique ID of the account's benchmark 2.

Benchmark2.description: The name of the accounts benchmark 2.

BenchmarkMargin2.description: The margin (% p.a.) of the accounts benchmark 2.

ReceiveCommunicationByPost.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

Capacity.description: Director = 0, SoleDirector = 1, CompanySecretary = 2, Partner = 3, Trustee = 4, SignedUnderSeal = 5, SignificantShareholder = 6, Beneficiary = 7.

ReceiveCommunicationByPost.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

TradingName.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

Identifications.description: Array of TFN / TIN / ABN / NIN.

ContactIsSignatory.description: Whether the contact is a signatory on the account.

ContactIsDirectorOrSignificantShareholde.description: Whether the contact is a director or significant shareholder on the account.

CountryOfIncorporation.description: Country of incorporation of the company.

DateOfIncorporation.description: Date of incorporation of the company.

NatureOfActivities.description: Nature of activities that the company performs.

UsPerson.description: Select if applicant is from the US.

SourceOfWealth.description: Provide the applicant's source of wealth.

TaxFileNumber.description: Tax File Number of the applicant.

Title.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual.

Phone.description: Primary contact number of the individual.

ReceiveCommunicationByPost.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

ReceiveCommunicationByPost.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

TradingName.description: Trading name of the corporate trustee.

NatureOfTrust.description: Nature of the trust. Bare = 0, Charitable = 1, Will = 2, Interest in possession = 3, Discretionary = 4, Accumulation = 5, Settlor interested = 6, Granted = 7, Single Person Pension = 8, Multiple Member Personal Pension = 9, Single Member SSAS = 10, Multiple Member SSAS = 11, Loan = 12.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

Usages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA. (AU only)

Bic.description: Bank identifier code (BIC) of your banking institution. (INTL only)

Iban.description: International bank account number (IBAN) of your banking institution. (INTL only)

RoutingNumber.description: Routing number of banking institution. (INTL only)

AccountType.description:
AU account types: Company = 13, Individual = 14, Trust = 15, SuperSmaAccumulation = 16, SuperSmaPensionAbp = 17, SuperSmaPensionTtr = 18
INTL account types: Isa = 0, Gia = 1, OffshoreBond = 2, Qrops = 3, Rats = 4, Sipp = 5, PraemiumRetirementAccount = 6, Pera = 7, PersonalPension = 8, GroupSipp = 9, Ssas = 10, Jisa = 11, OnshoreBond = 12.

RegularContribution.description: Regular cash contributions to the account.

RegularWithdrawal.description: Regular cash withdrawals from the account.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the account.

IsTradeFreezeOn.description: If a trade freeze is on.

TradeFreezeReason.description: TransferIn = 0, TransferOut = 1, Incident = 2, Deceased = 3, RemovalOfAdviser = 4, AdviserInstructed = 5, Bespoke = 6.

AdviserId.description: Adviser ID to create the application under.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

Applicants.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

Accounts.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

Id.description: ModelId as returned by the Models endpoint.

TaxWrappers.description: Unspecified = 0, CgtChargeable = 1, TaxExempt = 2, Unknown = 3, Isa = 4, OffshoreBond = 5, OnshoreBond = 6, PersonalPension = 7, RtsRats = 8, Sipp = 9, GroupSipp = 10, Ssas = 11, S32 = 12, TrustNotUkTaxable = 13, CompanyNotUkTaxable = 14, Qnups = 15, Qrops = 16, Efurbs = 17, Ebt = 18, InternationalPensionsAndSavingsScheme = 19, Jisa = 20, OffshoreBondPersonalised = 21.

SingleAssetModelIsin.description: ISIN of security. (Single asset model only) (INTL only)

SingleAssetModelCurrencyCode.description: Currency code of security. (Single asset model only) (INTL only)

MaxNoOfBankAccounts.description: Maximum number of bank accounts allowed by the PDS.

IsSuperSma.description: If the PDS is specific to SuperSMA.

Status.description: Status of the PDS, active = 1, closed = 2.

BankAccountUsages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

AvailableAccountTypes.description: Standard = 0, OffshoreBond = 10, Sipp = 11, Qrops = 12, RtsRats = 13, Pra = 14, Isa = 15, Gia = 16, Pera = 17, PersonalPension = 18, GroupSipp = 19, Jisa = 26, OnshoreBond = 27, OffshoreBondPersonalised = 28.
